means: 钒钾铀矿（一种放射性黄色矿石）

PerfectNetExp.abs: a soft silvery white toxic metallic element used in steel alloys ; it occurs in several complex minerals including carnotite and vanadinite .一种软质的银白色有毒金属元素，用于钢合金，存在于许多复合矿物中，包括钒钾铀矿和钒铅矿。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: named after Marie Adolphe Carnot (1839–1920), French inspector of mines, + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a yellow radioactive mineral; an ore of uranium and radium and vanadium
